tool.name: Scoop3-Argo
tool.description: Interactive visual quality control of Argo netCDF files
tool.help: Scoop-Argo visual quality control vizualises a series of Argo floats NetCDF cycle files. The data are displayed in interactive graphics, with bathymetry, climatology and geographic maps environmental informations. Quality Control flags are graphically changed by the User. When changes are recorded, the history section is updated with the list of performed changes.
